data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ozerov, A. L. (2018): Contribution to the fauna of the genus Meroplius Rondani, 1874 (Diptera, Sepsidae) of the Australasian / Oceanian region. Zootaxa 4438 (1): 195-200, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4438.1.13|6 occurrences
